scenario.title: The Mysterious Cave
scenario.description: You find yourself standing at the entrance of a dark and mysterious cave. The air is damp and the silence is eerie. What do you do?

inside_cave.title: Inside the Cave
inside_cave.description: You cautiously step into the cave. The darkness engulfs you, but you can make out a faint glimmer in the distance. What do you do?

treasure_room.title: Treasure Room
treasure_room.description: You follow the glimmer and discover a hidden treasure room filled with gold and jewels. Congratulations, you've won the game!

dead_end.title: Dead End
dead_end.description: You continue exploring the cave but reach a dead end. It seems there's nothing more to discover here. You decide to turn back.

game_over.title: Game Over
game_over.description: You decide to turn back and leave the cave. As you exit, a massive boulder rolls down from above, blocking the entrance. You're trapped!
